00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00031   using boost::intrusive_ptr;
00032   using boost::noncopyable;
00033 
00034   class ReferenceCount;
00035 
00036   void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(ReferenceCount *rc);
00037   void intrusive_ptr_release(ReferenceCount *rc);
00038 
00046   class ReferenceCount : noncopyable {
00047   public:
00048     ReferenceCount() { atomic_set(&refCount, 0); }
00049     virtual ~ReferenceCount() { return; }
00050     friend void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(ReferenceCount *rc);
00051     friend void intrusive_ptr_release(ReferenceCount *rc);
00052   private:
00053     atomic_t refCount;
00054   };
00055 
00061   inline void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(ReferenceCount *rc) {
00062     atomic_inc_return(&rc->refCount);
00063   }
00064 
00071   inline void intrusive_ptr_release(ReferenceCount *rc) {
00072     if (atomic_sub_and_test(1, &rc->refCount))
00073       delete rc;
00074   }
00075 
00076 }

00078 #endif // HYPERTABLE_REFERENCECOUNT_H
